title: GAP Lint Rules JSON schema.
description: This document describes the rules used by GAP Lint

items.title: Rule
items.description: A Rule is  one of a set of explicit or understood regulations or principles governing conduct or procedure within a particular area of activity, in this case the GAP Language.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The type of severity for the current rule. One of: error, warning.

when.title: When
when.description: Here you must specify the trigger for this rule.

regex.title: Regex
regex.description: The regular expression that will trigger the current rule.

then.title: Then
then.description: When this rule is triggered, a set of other instructions must be present.

items.title: Instruction
items.description: An Instruction is basically the instruction that must follow the trigger.

regex.title: Regex
regex.description: The Instruction regular expression that must exist follow the trigger.

inline.title: Inline
inline.description: If this Instruction must follow in the same line of the trigger, then set it to true, otherwise false.
